name: Gaia - Unstoppable Knight of the Dragons
text:
"Gaia the Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon" 
 Cannot be destroyed by card effects. Neither player can target this card with card effects. Gains 400 ATK for every "Curse of Dragon" and "Gaia the Fierce Knight" in your GY. If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK, and if you do, shuffle that monster into the Deck. You can target 1 card on the field; discard 1 card, then shuffle that target into the Deck. You can use this effect up to the number of Normal Monster's used for this cards Fusion Summon.
